snippet: The Green Party won a public-relations battle with Google on Tuesday, forcing its television advertising division to book time for a commercial in which its presidential candidate uses a (partly bleeped) obscenity.
abstract: The Green Party won a public-relations battle with Google on Tuesday, forcing its television advertising division to book time for a commercial in which its presidential candidate uses a (partly bleeped) obscenity.

headline.main: Green Party Ad Featuring Bleeped Obscenity Challenges TV Indecency Rules

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Green Party of the United States
